articles.description: Fitch Ratings raised its forecast for China's economic growth next year based on increased domestic demand and expectations of coronavirus vaccine deployment.
articles.content:
BEIJING Fitch Ratings raised its forecast this week for China's economic growth next year, based on increased domestic demand and expectations for coronavirus vaccine deployment.
Fitch now expects C… [+1720 chars]

articles.author: Mostafa Salem and Yong Xiong, CNN
articles.title: China's Sinopharm vaccine has 86% efficacy against Covid-19, says UAE - CNN
articles.description: An experimental coronavirus vaccine developed by Chinese state-owned pharmaceutical giant Sinopharm has 86% efficacy, the United Arab Emirates Health Ministry said in a statement Wednesday.
